<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete a static QR Code.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/v2/pix/deposits/qr-codes/static/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Remove a specific static QR Code associated with the user by its unique identifier.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Static QR Code ID.","example":"f6e2e084-29b9-4935-a059-5473b13033aa","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Header Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"nonce","in":"header","description":"The nonce ID is a UUID (v4) used to uniquely identify the requisition. All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Static QR Code deleted successfully.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

If any required params are missing or has invalid format or type.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

User authentication failed.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"404"} value={"404"}><div>

If the Pix QR Code static ID was not found.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"422"} value={"422"}><div>

If any required params are missing or has invalid format or type.

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
